alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Randolph, southwestern Lee and Terrell Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Weston, or 11 miles northeast of Cuthbert, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dawson, Shellman, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Pachitla, Bridges Crossroad, Herod, Yeomans, Dawson Municipal A/P, Graves, Goffs Mill, Armena, Oakville, Chambliss, Olivers Mill, Martins Crossroads, Brooksville, Benevolence and Chickasawhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
